subject: Collaboration Request for Simsonn Pedals Review
description_text:
Hello,
My name is Duarte Moreira and I am starting a content creator focused on sim racing. I am reaching out because I am planning to produce an in-depth review of your pedals, Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal with Haptic Reactor or Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor as well as a direct comparison with the Fanatec ClubSport V2.
The video will be produced in European Portuguese (PT-PT) and will highlight the key features, strengths, and differences between both products, helping the community make informed decisions.
I would like to know if you would be interested in collaborating on this project, either by providing a unit for review or by sharing any additional information you consider relevant.
I remain at your disposal for any questions.
Kind regards,
Duarte Moreira
